title: Bad Boys: Ride or Die
plot: When their late police captain gets linked to drug cartels, wisecracking Miami cops Mike Lowrey and Marcus Burnett embark on a dangerous mission to clear his name.

subtitles.author: ALL SUB

6412447 6414574 and former Army Ranger James McGrath

-[CHRISTINE SOBS]
5745364 5747324 Here I come, baby! Here I come!

5786197 5788657 Marcus, my gun. I dropped my gun
in the water. It's by your foot.
5788741 5789950 I don't need no gun, Mike.

5795498 5798083 -[LOW GROWLING]

5806091 5808594 That's how you command the universe.

5821023 5823192 -Where's the gun? Where's the gun?

5831033 5834453 That motherfucker racist, Mike.
That motherfucker racist!
5842711 5843879 I need you to trust me.
5915576 5917661 Come on. Come on. Get up.

5984895 5987773 Rita, stop this.
You don't want to shoot me.

6009753 6013132 -Ow! Ow!
-Come here. Okay. Okay. It's okay.
6028313 6030232 MARSHAL 3: Fan out. Take the team upstairs.

6117361 6118821 MIKE:
How did you let him catch you?

6120739 6122574 MCGRATH: Your wife and I

6122950 6125828 She seems to have
an inflated impression of you.
6128580 6130874 Nevertheless, this is the end of the road.
6131500 6133168 One of them is about to die.
6139466 6141677 What you don't know, Mr. McGrath...

6148058 6150894 A wise man told me

6151520 6155357 You need to check with that motherfucker
before you out here choosing shit.

6155440 6157568 MCGRATH:
You have five seconds, Mr. Lowrey.
6157651 6159236 We gonna need some more time, sir.
6161780 6163991 Mike. Don't you do no dumb shit.

6189474 6192895 -Here. Let me check it. Let me see.
-No, Mike. Your donkey ass shot me again.

6192978 6196565 -Let me look at it.
-Don't touch me with your donkey hooves, Mike.
6197941 6199860 Listen. I had to fucking take the shot.
6201069 6203196 Marcus. Let me take a look.

6204823 6208201 -I shot you in your vest. Stop bitchin'.
-It don't matter. Okay?

6208285 6210871 You see what you done
devoted your life to, Christine?

6210954 6212664 JUDY: [OVER RADIO]
I've got eyes on Aretas. Moving in.
6228555 6230140 Mom, listen to me, you don't understand.
6230223 6232059 Callie, I need you to listen to me.

6232184 6235479 I want you to step slowly to your right
and walk towards me.
6237648 6241360 Callie, I need you to move out of the way.

6243111 6246323 Mom, don't shoot, don't shoot!
Mom, he saved me. Stop!
6247616 6250786 Back off, Mike! Put the gun down.
6282359 6284277 Are you hit? Are you hit?
6292869 6294997 You did good. You did good.

6295080 6296790 MAN: [OVER RADIO]
Howard. Where are you?
6317936 6319730 Let's go. Let's go. Let's go.
6338498 6340125 It's not up to you, detective.

6384628 6386463 Come on, come on.
We got injured cops here.

6386546 6389466 -I need you to bring the writ to me now.
-[DORN GROANING]
6389549 6390675 KELLY: I know, I know, I know.

6390759 6392552 -How is he?
-You know, he'll pull through.

6402270 6405899 Mike, in our next life,
you coming back as a pair of my shoes.
6405982 6407692 And I ain't gonna wear no socks.
6407776 6409903 And I'mma step in all kind of shit.

6410278 6412364 MALE NEWSREADER 1: Miami DA
and mayoral candidate Adam Lockwood
6412447 6414574 and former Army Ranger James McGrath

6414866 6416618 were killed this morning
in a firefight.

6416701 6418787 FEMALE NEWSREADER: It is believed that
Lockwood and McGrath were the key links

6418870 6420789 between Miami law enforcement
and cartels.

6420872 6423166 MALE NEWSREADER 2: The late
Captain Howard has been fully exonerated.

6423291 6427838 Co-conspirators are currently being
rounded up by the FBI and the Miami PD.

6427921 6431508 MALE NEWSREADER 3:The search for
convicted killer Armando Aretas continues.

6442727 6444312 MIKE:
Hey, hey, hey. My people.

6444396 6446857 -Where's Theresa?
-She's with Little Marcus by the swings.
6447274 6448608 Hey. I'm about you hook you all up.

6449067 6450277 -I'm about you hook you up.
-DORN: Please. We're starving.
6458577 6459703 Why you got on an apron?
6461746 6463748 No, Mike, you gotta earn the grill.

6463832 6468712 This takes seasonings and temperatures.
You can't just be cooking on my grill.
6469045 6472007 Your grill? Joker, this is a public park.
6472174 6473884 You don't own every grill you see.

6473967 6478471 You know what, Mike? Why don't you
go make some potato salad and set the table?

6480515 6482726 Now, look. I don't...
I don't know what you got going on

6482893 6486521 with your barbeque dictatorship
in your mind, but I ain't the one.

6486605 6488815 I'm cooking on this grill
whether you like it or not.

6492402 6494196 What are you...
What you doin', Reggie?
6494321 6496323 Request permission to cook my chicken.

6500994 6502746 Permission denied, Reggie.
Go ahead somewhere, man.

6502829 6504539 Take your smock off
and go play with the kids.

6504956 6508251 Listen, this is the man area
of the barbeque.

6509961 6513715 All due respect, we appreciate that
you did save people that we love.

6513798 6515091 -We appreciate that, right?
-Yeah, we appreciate that.

6520597 6522599 All right, look.
I'm willing to compromise with you.

6522724 6525810 You can work that half of the grill.
It's small. And I'll work this half.

6537739 6542202 You need to let that motherfucker know
he ain't cooking no chicken out here today.
6542285 6546289 Mike. He killed 15 people at the house.
6546873 6548750 So, you not gonna handle this shit?

6548833 6552087 Yeah, I'm gonna let
that motherfucker cook the chicken.

6556049 6559511 Yeah, there's something weird in his eyes.
So I'mma make the potato salad.

6561221 6562764 Permission granted, Reggie.
There you go.
6929464 6931799 Come on. Bring your ass on.
6932008 6933968 It's too hot out here for this shit.

6934052 6937639 Wish I had a horse.
At least I could ride that motherfucker.

6937847 6941893 All this free air out here,
and I still smell your stinkin' ass.
6946439 6949108 I curse you for all lifetimes.

lines:
93342 96386 Hey, slow down, Mike, okay?
You're making me sick.

You're just anxious.

106772 109107 No, I'm anxious
'cause you made us late.

109191 111401 I'm not doin' this with you
in the next phase of our lives.

119243 122246 Hey, Mike, look,
pull over at that store right there.

220594 222679 'Ey, Mike, I told this guy I had to go.

237361 240822 Mind your business with your tattletaling ass.

249831 252167 Mike, he has a gun to my head.

you wanna deal with me?

285200 289246 and see the tailored suits,

295419 298714 -which is 90% of why I'm marrying you.
-[GUESTS LAUGHING]
302092 303260 I met you at your lowest.
306847 310350 But there was a fire in you that was...

314229 317899 And I vow to spend the rest of my life

Mental health is super important.

356646 359566 Oh, not yet. Don't jinx it.
I'm still just a lowly US Attorney.

366490 369576 I mean, the definition

380128 383507 I... I... I even surprised myself with this one.

you just hadn't met the right one.
386885 388970 I had some growing up to do.

406613 408448 -Marcus. Come...

421461 424464 I would've embraced you,

431847 436184 We got his daughter, Judy,

517515 519851 Let me in, let me in, let me in. Back up.

520560 523939 This is Captain Rita Secada.

673797 676883 Why don't you just step back

682222 684641 Same year your ass was wobbling in.
684724 687602 Oh, wow. Felt like it was five years.
688228 690730 I was in the basement of the ocean.

695402 698154 And full body love, Mike.

699406 700698 Why... Why... Why don't you, uh...

701366 704828 ...love your full body

704911 706287 MARCUS: Nothing to be scared of.

706371 709374 It's not my time, baby.
It's not my time.

853184 855061 You can't transfer funds from a phone.

907113 909949 And realizing the horror of her actions...

933765 935892 Hey, I tried to told his ass, T.

937185 940980 Apparently, he's an adult.

941064 944817 Hey, babe. Look, come on.

944901 948196 All these stents in me got my blood flowing.

952325 954952 Ey. Ey. Come on, man.

957538 959540 All right, babe. All right. Love you.
962418 964212 I wasn't even gonna tell you this...

what you mean?
968299 970551 No, I'm talking about our souls.

973721 977016 We're bound.

977100 981688 We haven't always been Mike and Marcus,

997412 999580 See... See, Mike, you stuck in the physical.

1001624 1003668 I'm pretty sure
my soul has a dick, Marcus.

1004585 1008089 See? That's that shit right there.

1008965 1011384 You know, I wasn't gonna tell you

1011467 1014679 but my soul

1016472 1019267 It's not that your soul is stupid.

1020476 1025314 It's just that you're more like a baby soul.

1025398 1027817 And I'm more like a mother soul.
1027900 1029736 And I just gotta suckle ya.
1030236 1032947 [CHUCKLES] You know? Put you on that titty.

1035491 1038911 Hey. How long you think

1053634 1057722 Say hi to Pop-pop.

1067815 1070234 -We're gonna have to hose them down.
-CHRISTINE: Mm!
1070318 1072945 All right. All right, we get it. We get it.

[CHUCKLES]
1080870 1082705 I never felt better in my life.

1087335 1089754 Oh, no, baby, I need you.

1095885 1097178 So, what's going on with my dad?
1097261 1100932 Um... Well, he was on the roof naked...

1101724 1105978 and he said he had been

1108898 1111818 Oh, and he said I have a stupid baby soul
1113694 1115238 MIKE: Y'all need to talk to him.

1133214 1134841 You know, we just got back from Yemen.

1139679 1141138 One thing you don't know, Reggie.
1141806 1144392 I got a camera up in here. Yeah.

1155987 1158906 No stress, no loud noises, no physical exertion.
1158990 1161075 Just sit your ass down somewhere, man.

1162994 1165746 And, honey, I'm doing it with you.

1168332 1172003 Look at all this man, baby. I'm brand-new.
1172086 1175006 I need animal sugars to survive.
1177717 1179093 I have a salad for you.

1190021 1192732 What you about to do?

1194483 1198029 Um, I'll give you $1,000 for some Skittles.

1205995 1208748 I think you're gonna be Ding Dong-less...
1241072 1243324 MIKE: You always take whoever I love.
1248037 1249956 MIKE: This is Detective Mike Lowrey.

1278067 1282405 The Department of Justice has been investigating
the corruption in the Miami Police Department.
1282488 1284949 And we now have credible intelligence

1285032 1288327 that Captain Conrad Howard
was directing these elements

1296544 1299630 I need to know exactly what time,
do you understand?
1302341 1304343 I found out two weeks ago.

1306012 1308222 I'm sorry about the way

1311017 1314562 Neither one of y'all would have a job
if it wasn't for Captain Howard.
1314645 1316397 Rita, you know this is not true.

1319525 1321569 The investigation
has turned up new evidence.

1321652 1324780 Miami law enforcement's been
a leaky ship for years now.
1324864 1328117 Witnesses turn up dead, informants disappear.

1328743 1333164 Events appear random
until you aggregate them over a period of years.
1336834 1340463 Bud Grice, FBI, heading up the JTF on this show.

1341756 1345009 Now, we knew
someone was providing intelligence

1345092 1347511 to a cartel moving product

1349346 1353392 A cartel banker turned up dead two weeks ago,

1353476 1355811 They found a phone with Howard's contact on it.

1355895 1360191 Years of communication with the cartel,

1362109 1364320 Final piece we needed
to nail that dirty motherfucker.

1410825 1413452 We're gonna figure this shit out, all right?
1418707 1420876 We're on the same team here, Judy.

1427758 1430386 If I ever catch him out on the street,
I swear on my father,
1433639 1435349 MARCUS: Come on. Come on, man. Come on.

1441730 1445317 They said he was working with the cartel.

1464879 1466714 They're saying

1473637 1476640 This is me telling you that I need you.

1487526 1489403 He was onto the ones that were.

and you don't even know the rules.

1514553 1517139 -There's dirty players on your side.

1533739 1535449 She's the one who dealt with him.

1536575 1539453 I knew we should have kept
that damn witch alive.

1553259 1556428 Our man on the inside

1556512 1559181 Computers, phones, files, all of it.
1559265 1561600 Well, we know Howard was onto our operation.

1561684 1564144 We just don't know how much he had.
We need to make sure we got every trace.

1568440 1570776 It's all the paper files.
They're clean so far.

1570859 1573570 Two phones had nothing.
His office computer was empty.

1575823 1578409 NICOLE: But his old personal laptop
had weak encryption.
1602641 1604643 He's texting us from the other side.
1623620 1626165 I'm putting you in mortal danger.
1628000 1630461 we got rats in our walls.
1630544 1634465 But I gotta make sure you're my bad boys.
1637009 1639553 The Coke-bottle giant is the key.

1646685 1650397 What's that? What does that mean?

1661867 1665079 We should put a bullet in these motherfuckers.
Be done with it once and for all.

1665162 1667998 Lintz, I love you. I'd like nothing more

1668082 1670584 But extra dead cops

1671960 1675631 Keep them under constant surveillance
and see if they make a move.

1679301 1681595 Fletcher's warehouse

1681678 1683806 Mike, I wasn't even gonna tell you this.
1685766 1688811 No, you gotta hear this. This is big.

1695025 1698987 Motherfucker, you did a pretty good job of dying

1706203 1708789 -Hey!
-WOMAN: Come on! Get out of the road!

1754626 1756211 you're saying that you won't die.

1759673 1762551 I'm saying... I'm...
I'm saying that you saying

1762634 1766805 that if I shoot you in your face,

1766889 1769349 Fate doesn't deal in hypotheticals, Mike.
1771518 1773145 [IN ENGLISH] I'm gonna call the police.
1773228 1775772 They're already here, ma'am. Mind your business.
1781987 1783864 See? You're putting your gun away.

1801381 1804927 Yeah, I call this place, you know,

1810724 1812392 What the hell is this place?
1812684 1816313 This is my studio gallery. I'm an artiste now.
1816647 1818273 Please, you ain't no damn artist.

1826782 1828575 He told us to talk to you.

1833664 1835374 -I said what I'm supposed to say.
-You didn't.

1835457 1838252 -Then tell me what I'm supposed to say.

1842714 1845425 Captain Howard saved my life.

1845509 1849388 I can't say what I supposed to say

1849471 1851932 Fletcher, just tell us
what you supposed to tell us.
1853767 1856228 Captain Howard was onto something big.

1856311 1860649 He didn't trust that you dumb fucks

1860732 1863944 Because you're stupid,
and I'm a genius.

1864027 1867614 So I protected the information
in something.
1877958 1880210 Flex your face one more time. Flex it again!
1880294 1883130 I will blow your fucking head off.
1886883 1890387 In something that will live forever.
1945984 1948445 Black jellybean. Nobody likes that shit.
1969633 1971343 I'm not fucking with you! Stop!
2046126 2048044 Burnett and Lowrey are moving north on 11th.

-I'm fightin' crime, baby!
2126331 2128375 Have you ever had a panic attack before?
2128458 2131711 What? Ain't nobody have no damn panic attack.

2131795 2136591 You're at 165 over 90. Sweaty. Nauseous.

2136675 2138635 All right. Thank you. Appreciate you, brother.
2138718 2140595 Mike, let the man do his job.

2158405 2161241 Rita, you ain't gonna believe this shit.
But we got a text--

2161324 2165620 A tip. We got a tip
